overview:
Mike Harty is a tech entrepreneur who is currently part of the founding team of the technology start-up Shopow.com.

Mike Harty has a host of internet experience, having opened and subsequently run his first e-Commerce website in 2004, whilst only 16 years old. Mike has developed and run a number of profitable web companies and thrives in the start-up environment. He has worked on web development for a successful web development company in the UK and has also worked on a web consultancy basis with a number of UK companies.

Today, Mike specializes in the technical skills of Search Engine Optimization, as well as having a solid understanding of the online social sphere. As a graduate of the University of Leeds, Mike is a business graduate who brings a mix of solid business understanding to the core internet skills he possesses.
